## PoiGeometry interface

Structured clone compliant version of a `three.js` geometry object with points of interest (POIs) to be rendered. It is composed of buffers with metadata for POI objects.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface PoiGeometry 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [imageTextures](./harp-datasource-protocol.poigeometry.imagetextures.md) | number\[\] | Names of the image texture or the name of the POI as indices into the array <code>stringCatalog</code>. |
|  [objInfos](./harp-datasource-protocol.poigeometry.objinfos.md) | [AttributeMap](./harp-datasource-protocol.attributemap.md)<!-- -->\[\] |  |
|  [offsetDirections](./harp-datasource-protocol.poigeometry.offsetdirections.md) | number\[\] |  |
|  [positions](./harp-datasource-protocol.poigeometry.positions.md) | [BufferAttribute](./harp-datasource-protocol.bufferattribute.md) |  |
|  [stringCatalog](./harp-datasource-protocol.poigeometry.stringcatalog.md) | Array&lt;string \| undefined&gt; |  |
|  [technique](./harp-datasource-protocol.poigeometry.technique.md) | number |  |
|  [texts](./harp-datasource-protocol.poigeometry.texts.md) | number\[\] |  |
